extendedInfo.description: Do you remember the drill sergeant from Full Metal Jacket? Here are 40 instantly recognisable quotes. Settable as either ringtone, notification, individual contact ringtone or alarm.They make awesome ringtones/notifications/alarms, especially alarms!!HIGH QUALITY SOUND.SEE SCREENSHOTS FOR CLIPS INCLUDED.FEATURES:* Set as phone ringtone* Set as phone notification* Set as individual contact ringtone - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an individual contact ringtone.* Set as alarm - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an alarm sound.Press to play and long press to set as ringtone or notfication.Excellent sound quality.Any suggestions are welcome.Any problems please email for a fix.

reviews.title: A. Silver
reviews.comment: Would be perfect five but freezes after one phrase on my Samsung Galaxy II S. I keep having to force close and start over.
reviews.author: A Google User
